Title: Reclaiming the Oathstone
Description:
Fine work, friend. It seems we've managed to repair the leylines within the Azure Archives.

Back when the blue dragonflight was united, I would tell my brothers and sisters to never doubt the strength of mortals.

Meet me at the oathstone to the south of here. I will reclaim it, and then be on my way to Thaldraszus.
ObjectivesText: Witness Kalecgos reclaim the Azure Oathstone.
RewardText:
It is good to be back... or reactivated, as it were. 

There is much to do, and I am glad to give whatever aid I can.
